text:
@SecPompeo Glad to see the world is finally aware that #CCP can never be trusted - HKers have been under their oppression for years and we know it well😣

This tyranny is why the world is suffering from the #WuhanVirus pandemic today. We all need to stand united and hold them accountable! https://t.co/x7EXWbRE6G
